channel.title: Party PK 317
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Party PK[/size]
[b]Intro:[/b] As the owner of Party PK my goal is to give everyone a fun, new server that is all about pking. I want everyone to have the feel for that classic pking server. This server is built around pking and in order to get many items such as D claws, Bandos, AGS, or even the Korasi sword, you have to gain pk points. Party PK is worth a shot and it doesn't hurt to try.
[b]Features:[/b] - Flawless PVP and PK point system - Double PK point weekends - Custom home area - D Claws w/ fully working spec - Korasi w/ fully working spec - AGS w/ fully working spec - VLS w/ fully working spec - All chaotic weapons - Primal weapons (Primal maul has custom spec) - Colored whips (yellow, green, white) - Bandos - Primal - Torva - Vestas - Statius - All Spirit Shields - DFS with charges - Fully working Slayer w/ slayer point system - Custom training area - Custom slayer area - Curse Prayers - Ancient and Lunar spells - Multiple bosses including Corp Beast - Voting system with voting prize - PK tournaments daily for prizes - Shows items kept on death and player stats - VPS COMING SOON
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/dbt9jd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/v5hijl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2nw288x.png[/img]
PK Teleports [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/54sza1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/nntg1z.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2w3ub0g.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/aemkhf.png[/img]
PK Point Shop (5 PPK points per kill) [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2vazae9.png[/img]
Donator PK Point Shop (5 PPK points per kill) [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/hx7pjt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/zo89zb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/32zjqs7.png[/img]
Boss Teleports [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2n371s.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/au8b53.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2r7stif.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/s3pzqd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2qnuykp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2qd3lgo.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/sxepfs.png[/img]
Items kept on death [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/9lc12r.png[/img]
There are also many more things within the server that will amaze you!
[b]STAFF[/b] [b]Owner:[/b] Nely [b]Co-owners:[/b] Mupersan & Manny [b]Admin:[/b] Cubanandre
[b]Play[/b] http://partypk.webs.com/ [b]Download Client[/b] https://www.dropbox.com/s/o1aaetgkfhjk42s/PartyPKwebclient.jar [b]Forums[/b] http://partypkrsps.freeforums.org/
[b]Give it a try and I guarantee you will fall in love![/b]

item.title: Party PK 317

item.description:
@partypkrsps wrote:

[size=24pt]Party PK[/size]

Intro:
As the owner of Party PK my goal is to give everyone a fun, new server that is all about pking. I want everyone to have the feel for that classic pking server. This server is built around pking and in order to get many items such as D claws, Bandos, AGS, or even the Korasi sword, you have to gain pk points. Party PK is worth a shot and it doesnâ€™t hurt to try.
